title: Mumble disconnects in a ghost fashion where it does not throw me off the server
body:
Using Mumble 1.2.3 that ships with Ubuntu 13.10 Desktop 64-bit, I am experiencing disconnects where Mumble does not reconnect until a good five or ten minutes pass.

I will remain in the channel. But I can not hear anyone, nor can I be heard. I already tried the forced TCP mode, but that did not change a thing.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1055/ .
